content.text: Thalassa Lucas is the king of Ilusia Kingdom, a country in West Blue.

During the Levely, he wore light blue robes, that were white at the neck, with a gold bracelet. He had short blond hair, and a medium length beard. He had thick lips, black eyebrows, and was seen smoking a cigar.
Lucas seems to be a rather wise man, as he correctly predicted that Dragon would become a large threat to the World Government.

He appeared briefly during Dalton's flashback. He was the man who showed a photo of Dragon during the Levely eight years ago in Mary Geoise. He said that Dragon's thoughts were dangerous and that within six more years Dragon would be a great thorn in the World Government's side, a prediction that, ultimately did come to pass.

elements.text: Thalassa (Θάλασσα) means "sea" in Greek and is the name of a Greek sea goddess who personified the Mediterranean.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 16 Chapter 142 and Episode 91, Lucas makes his debut.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File, Lucas is named.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 16 Chapter 142 (p. 6) and Episode 91, Lucas identifies Dragon as a revolutionary.
